scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run python manage.py runserver
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.migrate: cd backend && uv run python manage.py migrate
scripts.makemigrations: cd backend && uv run python manage.py makemigrations
scripts.seed: cd backend && uv run python manage.py seed
